name: when
description: Runs the given function only when the condition is met.
signature: (predicate: (...xs: unknown[]) => boolean) => (action: (...xs: unknown[]) => unknown) => (...args: unknown[]) => unknown

examples.content:
when(x => x > 0)(x => console.log(x))(5);
when(x => x > 0)(x => console.log(x))(-3);

questions: How to run a function only when a condition is satisfied?
